summary: This is an email from an FBI forensic accountant in the New York Field Office transmitting a subpoena rider for UMB Bank regarding Ghislaine Maxwell. The document shows ongoing investigative activity targeting Maxwell's financial records in January 2020.

persons.name: G. Maxwell
persons.context: The subpoena rider is specifically targeting her financial records at UMB Bank as part of an FBI investigation.

persons.name: Forensic Accountant FBI
persons.context: The sender of the email who is providing the subpoena rider for UMB Bank regarding G. Maxwell.

connections.description: The FBI forensic accountant is involved in obtaining financial records for G. Maxwell via a subpoena.

events.title: Subpoena rider transmitted for UMB Bank
events.description: An FBI forensic accountant emails a subpoena rider document targeting UMB Bank records related to G. Maxwell.

locations: FBI New York Field Office, 26 Federal Plaza, NYC, NY 10278
keyFacts: The FBI was actively investigating Ghislaine Maxwell's financial records as of January 2020.
A subpoena rider was prepared specifically for UMB Bank regarding Maxwell's accounts.
The communication originated from the FBI's New York Field Office forensic accounting unit.
This document shows ongoing law enforcement activity targeting Maxwell months before her arrest in July 2020.
